verses.english: This is the censer of pure gold, bearing the aroma
verses.arabic: هذه المجمرة الذهب النقي الحاملة العنبر
verses.coptic: Ⲧⲁⲓϣⲟⲩⲣⲏ ⲛ̀ⲛⲟⲩⲃ ⲛ̀ⲕⲁⲑⲁⲣⲟⲥ ⲉⲧϥⲁⲓ ϧⲁ ⲡⲓⲁ̀ⲣⲱⲙⲁⲧⲁ:
verses.coptic_english: Tai Shori Enoben KathaRos EtFai Kha bi AroMata:

verses.english: is in the hands of Aaron the priest
verses.coptic_english: EtKhen Nen JeeG En Aaron PiOwib Ef Ta le

verses.english: offering up incense upon the altar.
verses.coptic_english: O Estoy Nofi EEpshoy Ejen PiMa En Ersho Oshi
